title: Tata Motors sales dip 11% in July at 71,996 units
description: Tata Motors reported a 11% year-on-year decrease in total sales in July, with 71,996 units sold compared to 80,633 in 2023. Domestic sales fell to 70,161 units, with passenger vehicle sales down 6% and commercial vehicle sales down 18%.
